tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lighting_system ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    brand VARCHAR(255), 
    wattage INT, 
    availability BOOLEAN, 
    rental_cost DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE sound_system ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    brand VARCHAR(255), 
    power_output INT, 
    availability BOOLEAN, 
    rental_cost DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE lighting_systems (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    wattage INT,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sound_systems (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    power_output INT,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_rentals (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES lighting_equipment(id) OR REFERENCES sound_systems(id),
    rental_date DATE NOT NULL,
    return_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) CHECK (status IN ('rented', 'returned'))
);

CREATE TABLE rental_customers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE theater_rentals (
  rental_id INT NOT NULL,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  rental_date DATE NOT NULL,
  return_date DATE,
  rental_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rental_history (
  rental_id INT NOT NULL,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  rental_date DATE NOT NULL,
  return_date DATE NOT NULL,
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
